Articles.Content:
Hi there new friends!

My name is Juan, im from Argentina, finishing high school and preparing to study aeronautical engineering.

My dad works at the CONAE (Argentina Space Program) so you will probably see my posting a lot of news.

So,after i leave, here you have the first launch of the future argentinian space rocket, Tronador II! (Prototype name is VEX 1B)

There are more videos in the channel,which is mine

Have a nice day!
Welcome to the forums! Hope you've been enjoying the game.
Thank you mate, see ya in the forum!
Welcome At Kerbalspaceprogram Forum .3 years ago i visited Uk,it is really a beautiful country..

Wow! i don't know that the silver people got a Space program by their own.... Amazing!

We used to have one here in my country too... Well until the day that we had an a horrible CATASTROPHIC failure and the majority of our engineers/technicians/vehicle Assembly building get calciferated!

Thank you all of you guys!

Yes Nahim, i hear about the Brazilian rocket VLS1 ,its very sad.

But,they are working now with Roscosmos to make new generation of rockets,right?

Greetings.
